indications:
Indications zinc deficiency or supplementation in zinc-losing
conditions
name: ZINC SULPHATE
side-effects:
Side-effects abdominal pain, dyspepsia, nausea, vomiting, diarrhoea,
gastric irritation; irritability, headache, lethargy
doses: See preparation below and notes above

adult and child over 30 kg, 1 tablet in water 1–3 times daily
after food; child under 10 kg, ½ tablet
daily; 10–30 kg, ½ tablet 1–3 times daily
pregnancy:
Pregnancy crosses placenta; risk theoretically minimal, but
no information available
